name: SentAI
description: SentAI combines AI-driven automation and real-time trend detection to revolutionize how communities engage with blockchain. The platform enables anyone to create, trade, and manage tokens that capture emerging trends before they explode. Key highlights: - AI agent simplifies token creation and provides tailored insights - AI engine scans social media for viral keywords and new trends - Based on SM analysis, the engine automatically creates tokens - Both Ethereum and Base supported, catering to diverse needs
